name: story-alchemist
description: Transform PowerPoint presentations with AI-powered story structure and aesthetic design analysis. Includes two complementary skills: TaleTuner for narrative analysis and Aura Sense for aesthetic critique.

skills.name: taletuner
skills.description: Analyzes presentation story structure, narrative flow, and coherence. Provides creative scoring and actionable tips to enhance storytelling.

skills.name: aurasense
skills.description: Evaluates presentation design, emotional vibe, and visual personality. Delivers creative aura ratings and specific aesthetic improvements.

windows.notes: Full support for .pptx, .ppt, and .pdf with PowerPoint installed

macos.notes: Supports .pptx and .pdf formats. Legacy .ppt requires conversion.

linux.notes: Supports .pptx and .pdf formats. Legacy .ppt requires conversion.
